thread.title: Keith Olbermann Explains How The Trump Administration Just Made Life Worse For Pets
thread.title_full: Keith Olbermann Explains How The Trump Administration Just Made Life Worse For Pets

author: Lee Moran
title: Keith Olbermann Explains How The Trump Administration Just Made Life Worse For Pets
text:
Keith Olbermann Explains How The Trump Administration Just Made Life Worse For Pets "With one change made under this administration a lot of them are going to die." 02/10/2017 02:35 am ET Lee Moran Trends Editor, The Huffington Post Keith Olbermann has taken aim at the Trump administration for scrubbing public animal welfare records from the U .S. Department of Agriculture’s website. In his latest clip for GQ’s “ The Resistance ” series, the former MSNBC and ESPN journalist rallied against what he described as Friday’s “sudden” removal of inspection reports and materials regarding the mistreatment of animals. “With one change made under this administration a lot of them (animals) are going to die,” said the avowed dog owner, adding how “a lot of them are going to suffer, and you and I won’t even be able to find out it is happening.” 
Check out the full clip above. Related Coverage
